titleStmt.title: A most excellent and vertuous ballad of the patient Grissell. To the tune of The brides good morrow.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.
Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.

notesStmt.note: Based on book 10, novel 10 of: Giovanni Boccaccio's Decamerone.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
